item.title: 在关键的薪资测试前期货持稳
item.description: 继华尔街隔夜大幅反弹之后，周五美国股指期货走势低迷，投资者正在等待一份可能决定美联储降息路径的重要劳动力市场报告。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were subdued on Friday following a sharp overnight rally on Wall Street, as investors braced for a crucial labor market report that could determine the Federal Reserve's interest rate cut path.】

item.title: 晨星 DBRS 将 NYCB 的评级下调一档，原因是近期盈利压力较大
item.description: 评级机构 Morningstar DBRS 周四晚些时候表示，将纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）的信用评级从 "BBB "下调至 "BBB（低）"，理由是近期盈利压力较大。【原文：Morningstar DBRS downgraded the credit ratings of New York Community Bancorp to "BBB (low)" from "BBB", citing near-term pressure on earnings, the ratings agency said late on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，日产或将从 2028 年起在公司内部生产超紧凑型电动车
item.description: 五位熟悉内情的人士透露，日本日产汽车公司可能会在公司内部生产超紧凑型电动汽车，目前由小伙伴三菱汽车公司生产的樱花（Sakura）车型取得了成功。【原文：Japan's Nissan Motor may bring production of its ultra-compact electric vehicles in-house, five people familiar with the matter said, emboldened by the success of its Sakura model currently built by junior partner Mitsubishi Motors .】

item.title: 欧洲央行决策者为即将到来的降息排兵布阵
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的决策者们周五一致支持在未来几个月内降息，因为欧元区的通胀率下降速度超过了他们的预期。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers on Friday lined up in support of an interest rate cut in the coming months as inflation in the euro zone falls faster than they had anticipated.】

item.title: 中国新鹏的无人车 AeroHT Voyager X2 在广州市完成低空飞行
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商新鹏的关联公司新鹏爱飞客（XPENG AEROHT）在一份声明中说，该公司的飞行无人车AeroHT Voyager X2周五在南部城市广州的中央商务区完成了一次低空飞行。【原文：Chinese EV maker Xpeng's affiliate, XPENG AEROHT, said on Friday its flying drone car AeroHT Voyager X2 completed a low-altitude flight in the central business district of the southern city of Guangzhou, the company said in a statement.】

item.title: 英国石油公司从前任首席执行官卢尼 2023 年的薪酬中扣回 230 万美元
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）在其年度报告中称，前首席执行官伯纳德-卢尼（Bernard Looney）因未能披露过去与员工的关系而于12月13日被解职，公司从他2023年的薪酬中扣回了180万英镑（230万美元）。【原文：BP clawed back 1.8 million pounds ($2.3 million) from former CEO Bernard Looney's 2023 pay package following his dismissal on Dec. 13 for failing to disclose past relationships with employees, the company said in its annual report.】

item.title: 中国 2 月新增人民币贷款从历史高位回落
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，由于季节性因素，2月份中国的银行贷款可能从1月份的历史最高水平大幅回落，尽管中国央行正努力刺激疲软的经济增长并应对通货紧缩压力。【原文：China's bank lending likely pulled back sharply in February from an all-time high in January due to seasonal factors, a Reuters poll showed, even as the central bank seeks to spur sluggish economic growth and fight deflationary pressures.】

item.title: 欧盟监管机构将于 4 月中旬就 Tapestry 收购 Michael Kors 所有者的交易做出决定
item.description: 根据欧盟委员会的一份文件，欧盟反垄断监管机构将在 4 月 15 日前决定是否批准 Coach 母公司 Tapestry 以 85 亿美元收购 Michael Kors 所有者 Capri Holdings。【原文：EU antitrust regulators will decide by April 15 whether to clear Coach parent Tapestry's $8.5 billion acquisition of Michael Kors owner Capri Holdings , according to a European Commission filing.】

item.title: DS Smith 股价因蒙迪公司出价 65 亿美元打造欧洲包装业领军企业而上涨
item.description: 在更大的竞争对手蒙迪（Mondi）提出 51.4 亿英镑（65.8 亿美元）的全股要约收购这家英国造纸和包装集团一天后，DS Smith 的股价周五上涨超过 7%。【原文：Shares in DS Smith rose more than 7% on Friday, a day after bigger rival Mondi made a 5.14 billion pound ($6.58 billion) all-share offer to buy the British paper and packaging group.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因中国改革和人工智能激增吸引大量外国资金
item.description: 随着中国政府推出改革措施，中国股市反弹，加上人工智能（AI）热潮推动科技股大涨，外国投资者在 2 月份将大量资金投入亚洲股市。【原文：Foreign investors poured substantial money into Asian equities in February amid a rebound in Chinese stocks following Beijing's rollout of reform measures and a surge in technology shares, driven by the artificial intelligence (AI) boom.】

item.title: 经修订的日本第四季度 GDP 数据显示，日本经济可能避免了衰退：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，日本第四季度国内生产总值的修正数据可能会显示，由于企业在工厂和设备上的支出强于预期，日本经济避免了技术性衰退。【原文：Revised data for Japan's fourth-quarter gross domestic product will likely show that the economy avoided a technical recession thanks to companies' stronger-than-expected spending on plants and equipment, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.】

item.title: 1-2 月中国电动车销量放缓，降价促销愈演愈烈
item.description: 周五的行业数据显示，中国电动汽车销量在今年年初的几个月中有所放缓，市场领军者比亚迪正在进行一轮更深入的降价促销，竞争愈演愈烈。【原文：China's electric vehicle sales slowed in the opening months of this year, industry data showed on Friday, with competition intensifying as market leader BYD headed a deeper round of price cuts.】

item.title: 早间竞价美元统治出现裂痕
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 消息人士称中国恒大清算人任命法律顾问
item.description: 据直接知情人士透露，中国恒大的清算人已经聘请了三家律师事务所，为这家陷入困境的房地产巨头的清盘程序提供建议。【原文：China Evergrande's liquidators have hired three law firms to advise on the troubled property giant's winding-up process, according to sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 债券受托管理人成为清算中国开发商凯撒的新申请人
item.description: 香港一家法院将中国房地产开发商凯撒集团的清算听证会延期至 4 月 29 日，因为受主要美元债券持有人集团委托的债券受托人取代了原来的请愿人。【原文：A Hong Kong court adjourned a hearing to liquidate Chinese property developer Kaisa Group to April 29 after a bond trustee, instructed by a major group of dollar bondholders, replaced the original petitioner.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴灵溪游戏称管理层将卸任，为年轻高管让路
item.description: 根据一份内部备忘录，阿里巴巴集团旗下的视频游戏部门灵犀游戏公司（Lingxi Games）已告知员工，其领导团队将退位让贤，为更年轻的管理层让路。【原文：Lingxi Games, Alibaba Group's video games arm, has told staff its leadership team will step down to make way for younger management, according to an internal memo.】

item.title: 预计 2 月份美国就业增长放缓但强劲
item.description: 在连续两个月的强劲增长之后，美国 2 月份的就业增长可能有所放缓，但劳动力市场可能仍然过于强劲，美联储可能不会像金融市场目前预期的那样考虑在 6 月份之前降息。【原文：U.S. job growth likely slowed in February after two straight months of robust gains, but the labor market probably remains too strong for the Federal Reserve to consider cutting interest rates by June as currently anticipated by financial markets.】

item.title: 据媒体报道，韩国监管机构或将因市场问题制裁 Meta
item.description: 周五的新闻报道称，韩国反垄断机构将考虑对 Meta Platforms 实施制裁，因为该公司涉嫌未能保护 Facebook 和 Instagram 运营的在线市场的部分用户免受欺诈性交易的侵害。【原文：South Korea's antitrust agency will consider imposing sanctions on Meta Platforms for allegedly failing to protect some users of online marketplaces operated by Facebook and Instagram against fraudulent transactions, news reports said on Friday.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：华为和中芯国际利用美国技术制造先进芯片
item.description: 彭博新闻社援引知情人士的话报道说，中国公司华为技术有限公司和中芯国际集成电路制造有限公司利用美国技术，于 2023 年在中国生产出一种先进的芯片。【原文：Chinese companies Huawei Technologies and Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp used US technology to produce an advanced chip in China in 2023, Bloomberg News reported, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲股市创 7 个月新高，美国就业数据受关注
item.description: 亚洲股市周五升至七个月来的最高点，并有望创下两个多月来最坚挺的一周，原因是投资者对主要央行即将主导的宽松利率周期的前景感到欢欣鼓舞，从而使美元和国债收益率持续承压。【原文：Asian stocks rose to a seven-month peak on Friday and eyed their firmest week in more than two months as investors cheered the prospect of an imminent rate easing cycle led by major central banks, keeping the dollar and Treasury yields under pressure.】

item.title: 特斯拉和大众支持更严格的排放计划，澳大利亚汽车游说团体分歧扩大
item.description: 大众和丰田在澳大利亚提出的减少汽车尾气排放的新规定上站在了对立面，而电动汽车制造商特斯拉和 Polestar 则退出了该国的汽车游说团体，以抗议该团体反对更严格标准的活动。【原文：Volkswagen and Toyota have taken opposing sides on Australia's proposed new rules to cut vehicle emissions, while electric vehicle makers Tesla and Polestar quit the country's auto lobby in protest over the group's campaign against tougher standards.】

item.title: 波音公司称年度员工奖金将以安全为重点
item.description: 波音公司周四表示，该公司正在全面改革员工奖金的发放方式，以强调质量和安全，今年的运营目标将完全集中在这两个方面。【原文：Boeing said on Thursday it is overhauling how it pays employee bonuses to emphasize quality and safety, with this year's operational goals exclusively focused on these two components.】

item.title: UnitedHealth 称在线平台在 Change Healthcare 遭黑客攻击后已完全正常运行
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）表示，在其技术部门 Change Healthcare 受到网络攻击影响后，其药房服务的电子处方现已全面投入使用，索赔提交和付款传输也已可用。【原文：UnitedHealth Group said the electronic prescribing for its pharmacy services is now fully functional, with claims submission and payment transmission also available after cyber attack on its tech unit Change Healthcare impacted services.】

item.title: 交易员称标普指数错误可能引发摩根士丹利和辉瑞股价动荡
item.description: 交易员说，S&P 道琼斯指数公司的一个错误可能导致了摩根士丹利、辉瑞、PNC 金融服务集团和其他股票最近几天的波动。【原文：An error by S&P Dow Jones Indices may have contributed to volatility in shares of Morgan Stanley , Pfizer , PNC Financial Services Group and other stocks in recent days, traders said.】

item.title: 美国消费者机构因信用卡滞纳金上限被银行和美国商会起诉
item.description: 周四，美国消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）因新规定信用卡滞纳金上限为 8 美元而遭到起诉，银行业团体和美国商会称该规定惩罚了按时支付账单的消费者。【原文：The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau was sued on Thursday over its new rule capping late fees on credit cards at $8, which banking groups and the U.S. Chamber of Commerce say punishes consumers who pay their bills on time.】

item.title: 特斯拉司机在美国电池续航案件集体诉讼中败诉
item.description: 一名联邦法官裁定，指控特斯拉虚假宣传其电动汽车预计行驶里程的特斯拉车主必须通过个人仲裁来进行索赔，而不是联合起来提起集体诉讼。【原文：Tesla owners who accused it of falsely advertising estimated driving ranges for its electric vehicles must pursue their claims in individual arbitrations rather than banding together in proposed class action lawsuits, a federal judge ruled.】

item.title: 曲奇饼碎了，大选年的通胀辩论可能变得一团糟
item.description: 美国参议员约翰-费特曼（John Fetterman）曾在一次讨论食品价格高涨的会议上嘲笑竞选对手购物 "粗制滥造 "而闻名，本周四，他试图给这场可能成为即将举行的总统大选核心问题的通胀辩论带来一丝现实主义色彩。【原文：U.S. Senator John Fetterman, who famously trolled an election opponent's shopping for "crudite" in a discussion of high food prices, on Thursday tried to bring a dose of realism to an inflation debate likely to be a central issue in the upcoming presidential election.】

item.title: 通胀迷雾散去，市场看到更清晰的欧洲央行降息路线图
item.description: 由于新的经济预测显示通胀有望达到目标，投资者越来越相信欧洲央行可能会在 6 月份引领全球同行降息。【原文：Investors are increasingly confident the European Central Bank may lead global peers with a rate cut in June as new economic projections put on-target inflation in sight.】

item.title: 洞察力：美国监管机构为纽约商业银行的快速发展开绿灯，即使存在风险隐患
item.description: 美国银行业监管机构本可以阻止纽约社区银行进行一项导致其财务困境的交易。相反，他们却签字同意了。【原文：A U.S. banking regulator could have stopped New York Community Bank from pursuing a deal that has contributed to its financial woes. Instead, they signed off on it.】

item.title: 美国房地产市场的冰冻春天
item.description: 关于 QT 未来的更多信息【原文：And more on QT’s future】
